Translations.Text: ne kred hom kred woman se DI His messenger issue any ordon hav any choice regarding ke ordon! Anyone disobeys DI His messenger ir far astray

Recall vi dir al unu ben DI ben vi Keep your wife reverence DI vi kasx yourself ki DI wished proklam! Tiel vi tim popol when vi supoz tim nur DI! When Zeid est completely his wife ni hav vi marry her en ord establ precedent ke hom marry divorced wife his adopted fil. Di ordon done
prophet ne committing error doing anything far lawful DI! Such est di sistem fru generaci. Di ordon est sankt duty
Those liver di messages who reverence Him sol neniam tim anyone DI! DI est PLEJ efficient reckoner
Muhammad ne est patr any hom vi. Li est messenger DI final prophet. DI est fully aware da all AJX
O vi kred vi memor DI frequently
Vi glor Him tag kaj nokt
Li est Unu help vi together His angxel plumb vi out da darkness into light Li est Merciful towards believers
